title: Dame Oyaji
synopsis: Dame Oyaji is the story of Damesuke Amano, a hapless office worker who faces a tremendous amount of bullying on the job and especially at home, where he has (contrary to traditional Japanese notions of family) absolutely no power or say in the runnings of the household whatsoever.
staff: [['Sakaguchi, Hisashi', ['Episode Director']], ['Andou, Toyohiro', ['Script', ' Series Composition']], ['Tanaka, Eiji', ['Animation Director']], ['Furuya, Mitsutoshi', ['Original Creator']]]
